A.BATCH_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#, '%')
B.BATCH_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#, '%')
A.SCHDUL_NO LIKE CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#, '%')
A.SCHDUL_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#, '%')
( A.EXECUT_CYCLE = 'A' OR ( A.EXECUT_CYCLE = 'B' AND SUBSTRING(A.EXECUT_SCHDUL_DE, DAYOFWEEK(CONVERT(#executSchdulDe#, DATE)), 1) = '1' ) OR ( A.EXECUT_CYCLE = 'C' AND SUBSTRING(A.EXECUT_SCHDUL_DE, 7, 2) = CONVERT(DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT(#executSchdulDe#, DATE), '%d'), CHAR) ) OR ( A.EXECUT_CYCLE = 'D' AND SUBSTRING(A.EXECUT_SCHDUL_DE, 5, 4) = CONVERT(DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT(#executSchdulDe#, DATE), '%m%d'), CHAR) ) OR ( A.EXECUT_CYCLE = 'E' AND A.EXECUT_SCHDUL_DE = CONVERT(DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT(#executSchdulDe#, DATE), '%Y%m%d'), CHAR) ) )
